OOC: Move your asses people and come and get them!

BIC:
Katya: Stand up, Star Colonel. We have stayed here long enough. I say 
we go and explore our surroundings.

The large mech-robot looked at her, grinning as if he was amused by 
something.

Ragnar: You do remember the basics when you are lost, quiaff? Stay at 
the same place until rescue comes.

She turned her face, the wolf mask placing itself to form a 
breastplate. Her face was that of a very attractive and beautiful 
woman, and it seemed that the transformation had not erased the straw 
color of her hair.

Katya: Aff, I do. But I do not think that anyone will be coming for 
us. So, what good will it do if there is no one to find us?

Ragnar: And what makes you think so?

A sly smile crept on her face, but it failed to fully cover the 
despair behind it.

Katya: This planet is not Strana Mechty. The vegetation is not the 
same, the landscape is unfamiliar, there is only one moon. Also, there 
is nothing showing up on either infrared or magnetic optics aside from 
the natural normalities.

Ragnar was stunned.

Ragnar: Then, if there is someone around here, they will have to 
notice us!

He fired his long range missiles up in the sky. At about 900 meters 
high, the salvo exploded, producing at least something possible 
rescuers could rely on to find them.

Katya: If they are hostile, I think we will have to bid for the honor 
to slay them.

Ragnar: That, or we find out if something comes or what they are 
first.

They waited...
